ValidationRule.description: If the Requester email domain is "Nokia.Com" then the requester type cant be "Partner".
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Issue_Reported_By__c)), RecordType.Name = 'Partner Support', ISPICKVAL(PS_Requester_Type__c, 'Partner'), CONTAINS(LOWER(Issue_Reported_By__r.Email), 'nokia.com') ), AND( ISBLANK(Issue_Reported_By__c), RecordType.Name = 'Partner Support', ISPICKVAL(PS_Requester_Type__c, 'Partner'), CONTAINS(LOWER(SuppliedEmail), 'nokia.com') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Requester Type can't be Partner for Nokia Employee.
